name: Candice Meade
quote: I’ve just taken so much from our time together. I appreciate the space Erin leaves and how flexible she’s been. Just being open if there’s something that comes up that’s on my mind, it’s been really nice to have that kind of flow to the training and conversations.

name: Kartik Sribarra
quote: Erin has set the stage perfectly for our next chapter of growth, all the while leading our entire community–staff, board, partners, visitors and program participants–along a boldly antiracist agenda.

name: Brandon Blas
position: Greater Ithaca Activities Center (GIAC) Program Coordinator
quote: Thanks to our work with Erin, our staff, participants, and families all have a better understanding of our community and the natural resources that exist within it.

name: Tori Chamberlin
quote: I feel very fortunate to have worked with Erin so early on in my career. I knew from the start that she was there to support me. Erin saw my potential and sparkle and helped to remind me of it.

name: Ritza Francois
quote: Erin has this amazing ability to assure and handle any situation with the utmost care and energy it deserves.

name: Dan Klein
quote: Erin is magic as far as I am concerned, one of the few magic people I have ever met.

name: Andrew Slaughter
quote: Working with Erin offered me a consistent demonstration of fostering positive change through empathy and care for the community. I use the lessons Erin taught me every day.

name: Lauren Salzman
position: Educator, Cornell Cooperative Extension of Tompkins County
quote: Erin gives so generously of herself, her heart, her myriad skills and her creative vision. She provides a rare kind of nurturing leadership that has enabled me to love my work, and grow in my role. I am forever grateful for the opportunity to work with Erin!

name: Ginger Jung
position: Assistant Director of Admissions, Cornell Engineering
quote: Erin has powerful vision. She not only sees the potential in individuals, teams, ideas, and resources, Erin connects them dynamically and effectively. Undaunted by the work to get from A to Z, Erin has the heart, mind, and ingenuity of a world changer. I have seen her uplift the strengths she sees in others through thoughtful strategizing, leadership, and counsel. Her creative dot-connecting helps mission-based organizations focus on what they really want to do and how to get there. Bonus—she’s a dream to work with!

name: Monika Roth
quote: I learned a great deal from Erin about building a board, engaging donors, and building a solid team of staff with passion for the mission.
